Header: Committee appointed to inquire into Easter Sunday attacks
Content: A five-member Committee has been appointed to investigate and report as well as take suitable action with respect to the Easter Sunday attacks. The Committee has been appointed by the President. Appeals Court judge Janak de Silva is heading this Committee. The other members of the Committee are Appeals Court judge Nissanka Bandula Karunaratne, Retired Appeals Court judge Nihal Sunil Rajakaruna, Retired High Court Judge Bandula Kumara Atapattu and Retired Ministry Secretary W.M.M.R. Adhikari. Secretary of the Presidential Commission of Inquiry H.M.B.P. Herath said that the Committee will accept public complaints until the 14th of this month.
